# superset_role (Resource)

Manages a role in Superset.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the role.

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Numeric identifier of the role.
- `last_updated` (String) Timestamp of the last update.
